commit.message:
add missing rules for cppcheck 1.83

added rules:

* LocalAllocCalled
* RtlFillBytesCalled
* RtlZeroBytesCalled
* autoVariablesAssignGlobalPointer
* getprotobynumberCalled
* sizeofFunctionCall
* strlwrCalled
* struprCalled
* wxApp::MacOpenFileCalled
* wxArtProvider::InsertCalled
* wxCalendarCtrl::EnableYearChangeCalled
* wxComboCtrl::GetTextIndentCalled
* wxComboCtrl::HidePopupCalled
* wxComboCtrl::SetTextIndentCalled
* wxComboCtrl::ShowPopupCalled
* wxDataViewCustomRenderer::ActivateCalled
* wxDebugContext::GetLevelCalled
* wxDos2UnixFilenameCalled
* wxFileNameFromPathCalled
* wxGetWorkingDirectoryCalled
* wxGrid::SetCellAlignmentCalled
* wxSizerItem::SetSizerCalled
* wxSizerItem::SetSpacerCalled
* wxSizerItem::SetWindowCalled
* wxString::IsNullCalled
* wxString::LengthCalled
* wxString::LowerCaseCalled
